Meanwhile, Intel invests in 13-year-old Shubham Banerjee's low-cost Braille printer business

Meanwhile, Intel invests in 13-year-old Shubham Banerjee's low-cost Braille printer business — Technically in the same “communications” category as Riffsy, but not really at all. Awesome stuff, from the young Mr. Banerjee.
